betterquesting:10.desc:8:
It is not just Blood Magic and Thorns, the power of fluix and Matter-Energy networks can also be helped by this new discovery.
Its networking capabilities do not only apply to matter, but space as well!
This creates a type of space-time discontinuity like the one that makes up Arcana, but in a much smaller scale.
Anyhow, I now can say I am capable of generating my own worlds! 
The properties of space in these worlds are quite peculiar, there's probably magic that is only possible in there!
